## PassquitoCoreProps.billingForCredentialsTable property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Billing option for the DynamoDB table that stores credentials.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly billingForCredentialsTable?: dynamodb.Billing;
```

## Remarks

On-demand (PAY\_PER\_REQUEST) without caps by default.
